text: I talk to Allah, I pray to him.
author: SRK

text: I think love can happen at any age... it has no age.
author: SRK

text: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.
author: SRK

text: I work hard, like I'm sure everyone else does, and I'm very honest with the work I do.
author: SRK

text: Success come from experience, And experience come from bad experience
author: SRK

text: Software comes from heaven when you have good hardware.
author: Ken Oslen

text: Computers are fast; developers keep them slow
author: Anonymous

text: Allah tests you through blessings as well as challenges.
author: Invajy

text: Everyone wants to go heaven. But no wants to die
author: Robert Kiyosaki

text: Computer is like a Air Conditioner Machine, it becomes useless when you open window.
author: Linus Torvalds
